name: foreverness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or state of lasting for all time or never coming to an end: She got the idea for the project while researching plastic and its "foreverness". I stared at the huge foreverness of the night sky, and felt comforted.
More examplesFewer examplesHe wrapped his arms round her in security, warmth, and foreverness.Marriage was meant to be about foreverness, yet here was her husband walking away from their problems again.I am sitting on a hilltop, the foreverness of green fields and blue skies rolling into the distance.
